com.ae.apps.lib.api.sms

Interface SmsApiGateway

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSmsApiGateway, SmsApiGatewayImpl

    public interface SmsApiGateway
    A gateway which provides an abstraction over Android's SMS API Requires the permission android.permission.READ_SMS in the manifest Replacement for the SMSManager implementation from libAeApps up to version 3
    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getMessageCountForContact(java.lang.String uri, java.lang.String contactId)
      Returns the number of messages for the specified contact and URI
      long getMessageCountForUri(java.lang.String uri)
      Returns the number of messages based on the URI requested
      java.util.List<MessageInfo> getMessagesForContact(java.lang.String uri, java.lang.String contactId)
      Returns the list of messages for the specified contact and URI
      java.util.List<MessageInfo> getMessagesForUri(java.lang.String uri)
      Returns a list of SMS Messages based on the URI requested
